entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unhandled exception in request still logs `Request finished ... 200` #42218
    7.0-preview7
  • Support custom graphics from Blazor components across all hosting models #42216
  • SVG links cause full page reload #42213
  • Allow consistent `Problem Details` generation #42212
    7.0-preview7
  • Make AspNetCoreGeneratedDocument namespace visible to intellisense #42211
  • Nullable `struct` not working with `AsParameter` #42210
  • Blazor WASM does not handle NullabilityInfoContext correctly #42209
  • W3CLogger Response Headers #42208
  • IDX10206: Unable to validate audience. The 'audiences' parameter is empty #42207
  • Virtualize should allow customization of the spacer element type #42206
  • Standalone Blazor WASM with Azure Static App causes net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #42203
  • add support for dynamic consents in RemoteAuthenticatorView #42202
  • cannot be packaged staticwebassets.pack.json not found #42200

Closed

  • Standalone Blazor WASM SEO elements PageTitle and HeadContent does not work for multiple pages #42205
  • Blazor - DXF JS viewer "three-dxf" not working - "There was an error applying batch 17" #42181
  • Admin -user registration using blazor server #42201
  • Project templates are creating an "http" profile even when auth options are selected that require https #42138
    7.0-preview6
  • [QUESTION] Blazor Server SignalR with Azure AD System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '<' is an invalid start of a value. LineNumber: 2 | BytePositionInLine: 0 #42159

PullRequests

Created

  • Support binding parameters to type Uri in Minimal Actions #42217
    community-contribution
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly Project Template #42215
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Diff TestGroupName for project templates tests #42214
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fix doc comment typo in WebApplicationBuilder #42219
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix http/https launch profile creation in project templates #42143
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview6
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #42185
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7

Updated

  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #42195
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, feature-minimal-hosting
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Redo `yarn install` #42173
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Fix up user-jwts interactions #42125
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • catch JS exceptions when using InvokeAsync and throw them in .NET #41916
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • [WIP] ANCM + Arm64 + helix #39420
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Compiler runtime APIs needed for bind:get, bind:set, bind:after #40143
    area-blazor
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Error when Hubs are registered as Singletons #40396
    area-signalr
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Skip dotnet-install #40551
    area-infrastructure
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure
  • Normalize to arm64 in vcxproj #40697
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Fix nullability of TryUpdateModelAsync #41959
    feature-Model-Binding, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove generation of schemas in OpenAPI package #42169
    area-web-frameworks
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41247
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add linefeed terminator support #41269
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41283
    area-runtime
  • Add support for JSON transcoding unannotated methods #41493
    area-grpc
  • [Blazor] Unquarantine component E2E tests that were quarantined because of an SDK issue #41494
    area-blazor
  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • [6.0] Initialize Activity with parent ID #41765
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Use GetFolderPath(UserProfile) to obtain HOME dir #41865
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update duende versions to 6.1 #41896
    area-infrastructure
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Revert "Skip failing template tests" #41950
    area-mvc
  • Look at IIS functionals #41995
    area-runtime
  • Fix flakyServerReset_AfterEndStream_NoError test #42030
    area-runtime
  • Identity UI: Input forms' `form-floating` broken styles fixed. #42075
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Expose cookie extensions, consolidate cookie handling #42119
    area-security, area-runtime
  • [WIP] Obsoleting Pseudo-header public APIs #42199
    area-runtime
  • W3CLogger follow-ups #42151
    area-runtime, community-contribution
